title: For Cuba, Hostile Relationship With U.S. No Longer An Alibi
teaser: The U.S. rapprochement with Cuba seems to be on track. On Monday, the State Department confirmed that Cuba has kept its pledge to release 53 political prisoners and a top state department official is moving ahead with her plans to visit the island next week.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
